patches.name: Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch
patches.desc: A comprehensive bugfixing mod for Fallout 4.

patches.name: F4SE
patches.desc: Modifies FO4's API to give more control to mods.

patches.name: Address Library for F4SE Plugins
patches.desc: Used in a bunch of mods for better compatibility over F4SE updates.

patches.name: Achievements
patches.desc: Uses F4SE to re-enable achievements while mods are active

patches.name: High FSP Physics Fix
patches.desc: Untie the game speed from the framerate.

patches.name: Raw Input
patches.desc: Disables mouse acceleration, and makes the game much more responsive on PC.

patches.name: Insignificant Object Remover
patches.desc: Removed a ton of small objects for a decent performance bump.

patches.name: FAR - Faraway Area Reform
patches.desc: Optimizes distant textures for better performance while improving quality.

ui.name: DEF_UI
ui.desc: Provides a fully customizable HUD and menus. Includes KeyNuker to clean up the Misc tab.

ui.name: FallUI
ui.desc: Replaces the HUD with a highly customizable version. This is broken into multiple smaller mods that each replace part of the UI.

ui.name: LooksMenu
ui.desc: Overhauls the character creation menu to allow for much more customization.

ui.name: LooksMenu Player Rotation
ui.desc: Allows you to rotate your character while customizing your appearance.

ui.name: Full Dialogue Interface
ui.desc: Makes the game display the full lines of what your character is going to say in conversation.

ui.name: Extended Dialogue Interface
ui.desc: Removed the 4-option dialogue requirement giving mods more freedom on NPC interaction.

ui.name: Crafting Highlight Fix
ui.desc: Removed the scanline effect from items in the crafting interface.

ui.name: Value per Weight Indicator for Container UI
ui.desc: Adds a new value in inventories informing you how valuable something is compared to its weight.

ui_frameworks.name: Mod Configuration Menu
ui_frameworks.desc: Provides a central location for mod configuration, accessible via the Pause menu.

ui_frameworks.name: HUDFramework
ui_frameworks.desc: Adds a framework that allows other mods to add new UI elements to the HUD.

ui_frameworks.name: Settlement Menu Manager
ui_frameworks.desc: Allows mods to change the settlement build menu without having major conflicts.

ui_map.name: Improved Map with Visible Roads
ui_map.desc: An overhauled map with roads, topography and water. Much higher contrast to vanilla.

ui_map.name: Satellite World Map
ui_map.desc: A high resolution world map assembled from in-game aerial views.

ui_sounds.name: Quieter Settlements
ui_sounds.desc: Reduces the noise from settlement sources like generators and turrets.

ui_sounds.name: Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul
ui_sounds.desc: Improves various sounds by overhauling outdoor ambiance and indoor reverb.

ui_sounds.name: Ambient Wasteland
ui_sounds.desc: Adds a ton of new ambient sounds to make the wasteland feel less empty.

ui_sounds.name: Fallout 4 Reloaded
ui_sounds.desc: Overhauls all vanilla weapon noises to feel much more devastating.

ui_sounds.name: Modern UI Sounds
ui_sounds.desc: Replaces the menu, Pip-Boy, and HUD sounds.

ui_music.name: More Where That Came From
ui_music.desc: Adds over 100 songs to Diamond City Radio.

ui_music.name: Jetfuel Radio
ui_music.desc: Adds a new radio station with two hours of music.

ui_music.name: Synthstream FM
ui_music.desc: Adds a new radio station with 15.5 hours of synthwave music.

ui_animations.name: Advanced Animation Framework
ui_animations.desc: Provides a system for other mods to add new animations without overwriting existing ones.

ui_animations.name: Power Armor Animation Changes
ui_animations.desc: Speeds up the enter and exit animations and provides a more upright empty idle stance.

ui_animations.name: Realistic Ragdoll Force
ui_animations.desc: Massively improves ragdolls to behave much more realistic.

ui_animations.name: Lowered Weapons
ui_animations.desc: Allows your character to lower their weapon in first person.

ui_animations.name: Idle Hands
ui_animations.desc: Provides a bunch of new idle animations to both males and females.

ui_animations.name: First-Person Running Hands Animations
ui_animations.desc: Adds arms to the first person run animation.

character_creation.name: The Eyes of Beauty
character_creation.desc: Replaces vanilla eye textures with higher resolution ones.

character_creation.name: Looking Stranger
character_creation.desc: Adds many eyes with strange appearances like heterochromia.

character_creation.name: Commonweath Cuts
character_creation.desc: Conversions of KS Hairdos and ApachiiSkyHair from Skyrim to Fallout 4.

character_creation.name: Ponytail Hairstyles
character_creation.desc: Adds a few new hairstyles. Confusingly contains non-ponytail haircuts.

character_creation.name: Appealing Moles
character_creation.desc: Replaces the default terrible moles with much better looking ones.

alternate_starts.name: Start Me Up Redux
alternate_starts.desc: A continuation of the original Start Me Up. This mod allows you to completely change your start point. It is prone to mod conflicts due to how much it must change.

alternate_starts.name: SKK Fast Start New Game
alternate_starts.desc: This mod allows you to skip all the pre-war gameplay. As soon as you are finished your SPECIAL, you load to outside Vault 111. Compatible with most mods as it just changes the very start of the game.

character_leveling.name: PerkPointsPerLevel
character_leveling.desc: Allows you to set how many perk points you want for each level gained.

character_leveling.name: Perk Up
character_leveling.desc: Makes a few tweaks to certain perks to make them more useful.

character_leveling.name: Creative Perks
character_leveling.desc: Overhauls a ton of perks with new and interesting effects.

character_leveling.name: Creative Perks Plus
character_leveling.desc: A total perk overhaul based on Creative Perks. Changes almost every perk in the game.

carry_weight.name: Carry Weight Modifications
carry_weight.desc: Provides a bunch of options to change your carry weight, as well as carry weight per strength level.

carry_weight.name: Carry More with Power Armor
carry_weight.desc: Increases the carry weight boost you receive from wearing power armor.

item_weight.name: Weightless Junk and Other Items
item_weight.desc: Gives you options to reduce or eliminate the weight of junk items.

backpacks.name: Backpacks of the Commonwealth
backpacks.desc: Adds 20 backpacks with 60 mods and 50 colors.

gameplay_overhaul.name: Lunar Fallout All in One Overhaul
gameplay_overhaul.desc: A comprehensive overhaul of almost every system in the game.

gameplay_overhaul.name: Horizon
gameplay_overhaul.desc: A large scale overhaul of the entire game. Designed for survival mode, but can be used on any difficulty.

gameplay_overhaul.name: FROST Survival Simulator
gameplay_overhaul.desc: Reworks the ENTIRE game into a survival game. Most quests are removed, in exchange for pure wilderness survival.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Bullet Time - Slow Time
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Replaces VATS with a bullet time effect. Customizable AP cost and time dilation factor.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: VAFS Redux - Bullet Time and Manual Critical
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Replaces VATS with Focus for slow motion. Modifies VATS perks to provide Focus buffs.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: See Through Scopes
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Changes combat scopes to not block out your vision when ADS'd.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Take Cover
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Adds a cover system to 3rd person that allows your character to properly get into cover.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Pip-Boy Flashlight
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Overhauls the flashlight on the Pip-Boy and Power Armor.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Bullet Counted Reload System
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Fixes some wonky game engine stuff and adds proper reloading of weapons.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Tactical Reload
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Adds a second reload for when you still have a round chambered.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: We Are The Minutemen
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Makes some major improvements to the Minutemen. Turns them into an actual faction you can build.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Longer Lasting Fusion Cores
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: For those that use power armor a lot, fusion cores can be a headache. This gives you options on how long you want them to last.

economy.name: 1 Day or Instant Vendors Money Reset
economy.desc: Reduces the time it takes for vendors money to reset. Useful for selling huge amounts of gear.

combat.name: RDM - Rebalance of Damage Modifiers
combat.desc: Changes the damage modifiers on body parts to make headshots much more valuable.

weapons_armor.name: Weapon Balance Overhaul
weapons_armor.desc: Rebalances all vanilla weapons to make earlier weapons less obsolete.

weapons_armor.name: Synth Overhaul
weapons_armor.desc: Overhauls synth armor providing more variations. Includes a two modified synth weapons.

weapons_armor.name: Eli's Armour Compendium
weapons_armor.desc: Adds a bunch of lore-friendly armors.

weapons_armor.name: CROSS Pre-War Cybernetics
weapons_armor.desc: Adds some new cybernetic armor that increases your abilities massively. Think lightweight power armor.

weapons_armor.name: CROSS Jetpack
weapons_armor.desc: Adds a non-PA jetback designed to be used cybernetics.

weapons_armor.name: Nanosuit
weapons_armor.desc: Gives a neato nanosuit and some additional gear. Not very lore-friendly, but very cool.

weapons_armor.name: Enclave X-02 Power Armor
weapons_armor.desc: Adds the X-02 Power Armor from the Capital Wasteland.

weapons_armor.name: Hellfire X-03 Power Armor
weapons_armor.desc: Adds the terrifying Hellfire Power Armor from the FO3 Broken Steel DLC.

weapons_armor.name: Handmade Anti-Materiel Rifle
weapons_armor.desc: Adds a makeshift anti-materiel rifle. Various crafting options.

weapons_armor.name: Combined Arms
weapons_armor.desc: Adds a bunch of modern weapons. High quality models.

weapons_armor.name: BH SIG MCX Spear NGSW
weapons_armor.desc: Adds the SIG MCX Spear, with custom animations, textures, and compatibility with many other mods.

weapons_armor.name: SCAR-H
weapons_armor.desc: Adds the beloved SCAR-H to the commonwealth. Support for full customization.

weapons_armor.name: DKS-501 Sniper Rifle
weapons_armor.desc: Adds the iconic DKS-501 as a fully moddable gun.

weapons_armor.name: Modular Simonov PTRS-41 Anti-Tank Rifle
weapons_armor.desc: Adds three anti-tank rifles to the game. Completely customizable.

weapons_armor.name: AQUILA - Laser Rifle
weapons_armor.desc: Adds a new laser rifle that can be found is Boston.

weapons_armor.name: Wattz Laser Gun
weapons_armor.desc: Adds the Wattz 3000, inspired by the Wattz 2000 from Fallout. Has some compatibility issues so check for patches.

weapons_armor.name: CROSS PlasRail
weapons_armor.desc: A heavily moddable plasma rifle. Also has some compatibility issues with other mods. Patches are usually available.

camping.name: Campsite
camping.desc: A lightweight camping mod that adds tents, sleeping bags, fires, etc.

camping.name: Kitcat's Camping Gear
camping.desc: Adds portable tents and crafting stations.

traps.name: Deadly Traps and Hazards
traps.desc: Settlement traps and other hazards become much more of a threat.

diseases.name: The Elder Sickness
diseases.desc: Adds 8 new illnesses based on some diseases from Skyrim. Also makes a modification to Molerat Disease.

diseases.name: HEV Power Armor
diseases.desc: Prevents you from gaining any infection, or being affected by weakness or poison while wearing power armor.

timescale.name: Time Scale and Fast Travel Adjustment
timescale.desc: Makes days pass much slower and changes fast travel speed so time passes like you jogged there.

weather.name: True Storms
weather.desc: A complete overhaul of the storm system. New weathers, effects, and dangers.

weather.name: Vivid Weathers
weather.desc: Another overhaul of the weather and climate system. Adds 75 new weathers.

lighting.name: Enhanced Lights and FX
lighting.desc: Overhauls many light sources to give a more atmospheric and realistic lighting.

environment.name: Vivid Fallout
environment.desc: A total replacement of landscape, tree, rock, road, and even more textures. Designed to be efficient while increasing the quality of the Commonwealth.

environment.name: A Forest
environment.desc: This mod covers the majority of the Commonwealth with a dense forest, inspired by Chernobyl and Bikini Atoll.

environment.name: Natural Landscapes
environment.desc: Replaces most rocks and roads to make them feel more weathered.

environment.name: Vivid Waters
environment.desc: Overhauls all water textures, including reflections and opacity, in an attempt to make the water look much more realistic.

speed.name: Realistic Movement Speed for the Wasteland
speed.desc: Adjusts the speeds of the player, and NPCs. Provides a more realistic feel of faster walking, slower running.

fast_travel.name: Central Station
fast_travel.desc: Adds a lore-friendly replacement for fast travel.

vehicles.name: Drivables of the Commonwealth - Semi Trucks
vehicles.desc: Adds 3 drivable/ridable semi-trucks to the game.

vehicles.name: Drivables of the Commonwealth - APC
vehicles.desc: Adds a drivable APC to the game. Requires a quest to obtain it.

vehicles.name: Drivables of the Commonwealth - Jeep
vehicles.desc: Adds 4 drivable jeeps to the game.

vehicles.name: Drivables of the Commonwealth - Boats
vehicles.desc: Adds 6 boats that can be driven.

companions.name: Heather Casdin
companions.desc: 2200 lines of custom dialogue and a ton of quests.

companions.name: Ellen
companions.desc: The first companion with custom voice lines. Over 1200 lines. Custom quest, affility system, and romance.

companions.name: I'm Darlene
companions.desc: A full custom companion with 5000 lines of dialogue, 5 quests, and 5 perks. Affinity support, and romancable.

companions.name: Capital Wasteland Robot Pack
companions.desc: Adds 4 new robots to the Automatron DLC with their respective weapons and voice-lines.

companion_enhancements.name: Everyone's Best Friend
companion_enhancements.desc: Allows you to always have Dogmeat in addition to another companion.

companion_enhancements.name: Unlimited Companion Framework
companion_enhancements.desc: Allows you to have unlimited companions.

companion_enhancements.name: Companion Infinite Ammo
companion_enhancements.desc: Gives all companions infinite ammo. No more worrying about them wasting rounds.

companion_enhancements.name: Deeper Thoughts - Curie
companion_enhancements.desc: Gives access to a bunch of unused Curie dialogue.

companion_enhancements.name: Platinum Curie
companion_enhancements.desc: A complete overhaul of Curie's looks to better match her tough but innocent demeanor.

npc_enhancements.name: Better Settlers
npc_enhancements.desc: Adds over 240 new settlers. Many options for customization.

npc_enhancements.name: Rich Merchants
npc_enhancements.desc: Gives all merchants more money. Customizable.

npc_enhancements.name: Immersive Merchants
npc_enhancements.desc: Vendors will have their stores/stalls decorated according to what they sell.

npc_enhancements.name: Settler and Companion Dialogue Overhaul
npc_enhancements.desc: Adds tons of cut dialogue from npcs and companions. Adds additional quests.

enemy_enhancements.name: Super Mutant Redux
enemy_enhancements.desc: Overhauls the super mutants. Increases their durability significantly.

enemy_enhancements.name: Automatron for All
enemy_enhancements.desc: Changes all vanilla bot inventories to have Automatron parts.

stealth.name: Stealth and Detection System
stealth.desc: Overhauls the stealth system to allow for actual stealth gameplay. Provides an easier experience but a more realistic one. Agility affects stealth.

lockpicking.name: Breakable Locks
lockpicking.desc: Gives an alternative method for opening locked doors. Shoot them. Configurable requirements.

lockpicking.name: Better Locks
lockpicking.desc: Retextures the locks and tools when lockpicking.

crime.name: Crime and Punishment
crime.desc: An overhaul for the crime system, bringing back karma, and complete with consequences for all your crimes. Adult content disabled by default.

crafting_overhaul.name: Armor and Weapon Keywords Community Resource
crafting_overhaul.desc: Adds a new item tagging system to allow mods to work together better.

crafting_overhaul.name: Workshop Framework
crafting_overhaul.desc: Provides a framework to allow mods to integrate with the settlement workshop without breaking compatibility.

crafting_overhaul.name: Crafting Mastery
crafting_overhaul.desc: Replaces the old system of all crafting recipes using the Chem Table with dedicated crafting stations for different types of item.

crafting_overhaul.name: Equipment and Crafting Overhaul
crafting_overhaul.desc: Adds the universal workbench which can act as any type of crafting station.

crafting.name: Legendary Modification
crafting.desc: Allows you to craft legendary gear if you really dislike searching for it.

crafting.name: Rechambering Plus
crafting.desc: Adds the chambering mod, allowing you to switch the ammo type a weapon fires.

crafting.name: Rechargable Fusion Cores
crafting.desc: Provides a new device to recharge fusion cores.

cooking.name: CHEF
cooking.desc: Rebalances cooking recipes and adds 50 new foods.

settlement.name: Settlement Keywords Expanded
settlement.desc: Provides a bunch of new categories for the settlement menu.

settlement.name: Sim Settlements 2
settlement.desc: Adds a whole simulation system that allows settlers to build their own housing.

settlement.name: Scrap Everything
settlement.desc: Gives you full freedom to scrap every object inside a settlement.

settlement.name: Spring Cleaning
settlement.desc:
Allows you to scrap much more stuff to clean up your settlements.
The *[Spring Cleaning Compatibility Patch](https://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/12702)* is highly recommended to avoid any potential conflicts.

settlement.name: Snappable Junk Fences
settlement.desc: Junk fences should now snap together, giving a much cleaner look.

settlement.name: Looks Mirror
settlement.desc: Adds a mirror to the workshop that gives access to the LooksMenu without console commands.

settlement.name: Settlement Objects Expansion Pack
settlement.desc: Adds over 1500 new objects to build and decorate your settlements with. Not all lore friendly.

settlement.name: Homemaker
settlement.desc: Adds over 1000 new objects to build your settlements with.

settlement.name: Settlement Supplies Expanded
settlement.desc: Adds arount 400 more objects for settlements.

settlement.name: Functional Displays
settlement.desc: Adds a bunch of racks and boards that can be used to display items, weapon, armor, etc.

settlement.name: OCDecorator
settlement.desc: Gives the ability to place any lootable object as a static object. Decorate your settlement to your heart's content.

settlement.name: Snappable Power Armor Workbenches
settlement.desc: Makes power armor stations snappable so it's easier to make a garage with all your gear.

settlement.name: Castle Walls Repaired
settlement.desc: Adds castle walls to the workshop, and allows much more of the castle to be scrapped.

settlement.name: Repairable Sanctuary
settlement.desc: Allows you to repair the bridge and houses of sanctuary. Highly recommended to use Spring Cleaning too.

settlement.name: CROP
settlement.desc: Provides a bunch of planters for your gardening needs.

settlement.name: Manufacturing Extended
settlement.desc: Adds new machines to the Contraptions Workshop DLC. Everything from power armor manufacturing to ammo factories.

settlement.name: Snap'n Build
settlement.desc: Adds new building sets that are fully snappable.

settlement.name: Longer Power Lines
settlement.desc: Gives a few options for longer power lines. Now you don't need as many towers littering your settlements.
